Date: Wednesday, 2/5/1988
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Warner Cannaday



Date: Saturday, 2/15/1988
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Diablo!

Regards,
Warner Cannaday

Subject: Progress of Scott Erb
Dear Sir,
Scott Erb has nothing more to prove at AA Cordan Crows!
He has an ERA of 3.50 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 5/3/1988
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Clair Clutter
